section.title: Who Should Read This Book?
section.p: The Server Assemblers Guide is written for assemblers who want to assemble a Server Application for Phoenix. It is assumed that you are familiar with the basic concepts of the Phoenix framework.

This book concentrates on assembly, and as such requires no knowledge of java programming. It does however assume you are familiar with server fundamentals, basic security measures, and performance tuning.

section.title: Organization
section.p: The information is organized into sections detailing a specifc aspect of assembling Server Applications.
